definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: There are two ways in structuring handwritten documents, off-line and on-line.
sentences.chinese: 目前关于手写文档的结构化，分为联机和脱机两种。

sentences.english: Break disk mirrors into active and offline sides.
sentences.chinese: 将磁盘镜像分为活动方和脱机方。

sentences.english: This Paper describes data records based on C-band tracking radar and off-line processing.
sentences.chinese: 描述C波段跟踪雷达数据记录和脱机处理情况。

sentences.english: You may want to print a hardcopy of this security FAQ page for reading offline.
sentences.chinese: 您可能需要打印脱机安全常见问题页面阅读的印刷版。

sentences.english: Large memory capacity & possible offline work.
sentences.chinese: 内存容量大，可脱机使用。

sentences.english: This message cannot BE moved while Communicator is offline.
sentences.chinese: 在通信器脱机时，不能移动此消息。

sentences.english: For the first time in over a decade this reporter can actually say he enjoys using off-line help.
sentences.chinese: 十多年来这是第一次，说明大家更喜欢使用脱机帮助。

sentences.english: Break mirrors into active and offline sides.
sentences.chinese: 将镜像分为活动方和脱机方。

sentences.english: To do this, single click "off-line work" on "file" menu.
sentences.chinese: 为此，单击“文件”菜单上的“脱机作业”。

sentences.english: Amy online with zhao to chat, but zhao to but a set off line state.
sentences.chinese: 艾米上网跟赵来聊天，可是赵来却设置成了脱机状态。

sentences.english: This folder is only available when using offline documentation.
sentences.chinese: 该文件夹只有使用脱机文档时才可使用。

sentences.english: This is where job spooling can provide a solution.
sentences.chinese: 作业假脱机就可以提供这种解决方案。

sentences.english: Weaning and extubation readiness in pediatric patients.
sentences.chinese: 儿科患者的脱机和拔管准备。

sentences.english: These queued requests are then processed one at a time by the job spooler.
sentences.chinese: 然后，作业假脱机程序每次处理一个排队的请求。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
